org.drip.analytics.cashflow

Class ComposableUnitPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.cashflow.ComposableUnitPeriod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComposableUnitFixedPeriod, ComposableUnitFloatingPeriod

    public abstract class ComposableUnitPeriod
extends java.lang.Object
    ComposableUnitPeriod contains the cash flow periods' composable unit period details. Currently it holds the accrual start date, the accrual end date, the fixed coupon, the basis spread, coupon and accrual day counts, and the EOM adjustment flags.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
